  1 | syntax = "proto3";
  2 | 
  3 | package portfolio;
  4 | 
  5 | import "google/protobuf/timestamp.proto";
  6 | import "google/protobuf/empty.proto";
  7 | 
  8 | // Request data for getting portfolio
  9 | message GetPortfolioRequestData {
 10 |     string broker_id = 1;       // Broker identifier (UUID)
 11 |     string account_number = 2;  // Trading account number
 12 | }
 13 | 
 14 | // Request message for getting portfolio
 15 | message GetPortfolioRequest {
 16 |     string request_id = 1;      // Unique request identifier
 17 |     string timestamp = 2;       // Request timestamp
 18 |     GetPortfolioRequestData data = 3; // Request data
 19 | }
 20 | 
 21 | // Message representing a stock position
 22 | message StockPosition {
 23 |     string symbol = 1;
 24 |     int64 quantity = 2;
 25 |     int64 on_hand = 3;
 26 |     int64 buy_t0 = 4;
 27 |     int64 buy_t1 = 5;
 28 |     int64 buy_t2 = 6;
 29 |     int64 sell_t0 = 7;
 30 |     int64 sell_t1 = 8;
 31 |     int64 sell_t2 = 9;
 32 |     double average_price = 10;
 33 |     double market_price = 11;
 34 |     double market_value = 12;
 35 |     double profit_loss = 13;
 36 |     double profit_loss_percent = 14;
 37 | }
 38 | 
 39 | // Message representing account balance
 40 | message AccountBalance {
 41 |     double cash_balance = 1;
 42 |     double withdrawable_amount = 2;
 43 |     double total_asset = 3;
 44 | }
 45 | 
 46 | // Message representing purchasing power
 47 | message PurchasingPower {
 48 |     double purchasing_power = 1;
 49 |     double margin_ratio = 2;
 50 | }
 51 | 
 52 | // Message containing portfolio data
 53 | message PortfolioData {
 54 |     string account_number = 1;
 55 |     repeated StockPosition positions = 2;
 56 |     AccountBalance balance = 3;
 57 |     PurchasingPower purchasing_power = 4;
 58 | }
 59 | 
 60 | // Response message containing portfolio data
 61 | message GetPortfolioResponse {
 62 |     string response_id = 1;     // Unique response identifier
 63 |     string timestamp = 2;       // Response timestamp
 64 |     string reference_id = 3;    // Reference to request_id
 65 |     int32 code = 4;            // Response code (0 = success)
 66 |     string message = 5;        // Response message
 67 |     PortfolioData data = 6;    // Portfolio data
 68 | }
 69 | 
 70 | // ===== NEW PORTFOLIO MANAGEMENT MESSAGES =====
 71 | 
 72 | // Create portfolio request
 73 | message CreatePortfolioRequest {
 74 |     string request_id = 1;
 75 |     string timestamp = 2;
 76 |     CreatePortfolioData data = 3;
 77 | }
 78 | 
 79 | message CreatePortfolioData {
 80 |     string account_id = 1;
 81 |     string name = 2;
 82 |     string description = 3;
 83 |     string portfolio_type = 4;  // TRADING, INVESTMENT, RETIREMENT, MARGIN
 84 |     bool is_watchlist = 5;
 85 |     repeated string tags = 6;
 86 |     
 87 |     // AI options
 88 |     bool use_ai_suggestion = 7;
 89 |     string ai_strategy = 8;  // GROWTH, VALUE, BALANCED, DIVIDEND
 90 |     string risk_level = 9;   // LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH
 91 |     double investment_amount = 10;
 92 |     repeated string target_sectors = 11;
 93 |     repeated string excluded_symbols = 12;
 94 | }
 95 | 
 96 | message CreatePortfolioResponse {
 97 |     string response_id = 1;
 98 |     string timestamp = 2;
 99 |     string reference_id = 3;
100 |     int32 code = 4;

406 | }
407 | 
408 | // ===== DATA STRUCTURES =====
409 | 
410 | // Managed portfolio summary
411 | message ManagedPortfolioSummary {
412 |     string portfolio_id = 1;
413 |     string name = 2;
414 |     string description = 3;
415 |     string portfolio_type = 4;
416 |     string portfolio_source = 5;
417 |     bool is_watchlist = 6;
418 |     bool is_active = 7;
419 |     int32 symbol_count = 8;
420 |     repeated string tags = 9;
421 |     double total_value = 10;
422 |     string ai_strategy = 11;
423 |     double ai_confidence_score = 12;
424 |     google.protobuf.Timestamp created_at = 13;
425 |     google.protobuf.Timestamp updated_at = 14;
426 | }
427 | 
428 | // Full managed portfolio details
429 | message ManagedPortfolio {
430 |     string portfolio_id = 1;
431 |     string account_id = 2;
432 |     string name = 3;
433 |     string description = 4;
434 |     string portfolio_type = 5;
435 |     string portfolio_source = 6;
436 |     bool is_watchlist = 7;
437 |     bool is_active = 8;
438 |     repeated string tags = 9;
439 |     string ai_strategy = 10;
440 |     double ai_confidence_score = 11;
441 |     string visibility = 12;
442 |     repeated string shared_with = 13;
443 |     string notes = 14;
444 |     repeated PortfolioSymbol symbols = 15;
445 |     double total_value = 16;
446 |     double total_pnl = 17;
447 |     double total_return_percent = 18;
448 |     google.protobuf.Timestamp created_at = 19;
449 |     google.protobuf.Timestamp updated_at = 20;
450 | }
451 | 
452 | // Portfolio symbol
453 | message PortfolioSymbol {
454 |     string symbol = 1;
455 |     string added_source = 2;
456 |     double target_weight_percent = 3;
457 |     double target_price = 4;
458 |     double stop_loss_price = 5;
459 |     double take_profit_price = 6;
460 |     string notes = 7;
461 |     google.protobuf.Timestamp added_at = 8;
462 |     double ai_recommendation_score = 9;
463 |     string ai_reasoning = 10;
464 | }
465 | 
466 | // Symbol operation result
467 | message SymbolOperationResult {
468 |     string portfolio_id = 1;
469 |     string symbol = 2;
470 |     bool success = 3;
471 |     string message = 4;
472 | }
473 | 
474 | // Share operation result
475 | message ShareOperationResult {
476 |     string portfolio_id = 1;
477 |     string shared_with_user_id = 2;
478 |     bool success = 3;
479 |     string message = 4;
480 | }
481 | 
482 | // Portfolio symbols list
483 | message PortfolioSymbolsList {
484 |     repeated PortfolioSymbol symbols = 1;
485 |     int32 total_count = 2;
486 | }
487 | 
488 | // Shared portfolios list
489 | message SharedPortfoliosList {
490 |     repeated SharedPortfolioInfo shared_portfolios = 1;
491 |     int32 total_count = 2;
492 | }
493 | 
494 | message SharedPortfolioInfo {
495 |     string portfolio_id = 1;
496 |     string name = 2;
497 |     string description = 3;
498 |     string owner_name = 4;
499 |     string portfolio_type = 5;
500 |     int32 symbol_count = 6;
501 |     repeated string tags = 7;
502 |     string shared_at = 8;
503 |     bool readonly = 9;
504 | }
505 | 
506 | // AI portfolio suggestion
507 | message AIPortfolioSuggestion {
508 |     string suggestion_id = 1;
509 |     string strategy = 2;
510 |     repeated AIStockSuggestion suggested_stocks = 3;
511 |     double confidence_score = 4;
512 |     string reasoning = 5;
513 |     string risk_level = 6;
514 | }
515 | 
516 | message AIStockSuggestion {
517 |     string symbol = 1;
518 |     double weight_percent = 2;
519 |     double score = 3;
520 |     string reasoning = 4;
521 |     double target_price = 5;
522 |     double stop_loss = 6;
523 |     string sector = 7;
524 | }
525 | 
526 | // AI suggestions list
527 | message AISuggestionsList {
528 |     repeated AIStockSuggestion suggestions = 1;
529 |     int32 total_count = 2;
530 | }
531 | 
532 | // Portfolio statistics
533 | message PortfolioStatistics {
534 |     int32 total_portfolios = 1;
535 |     int32 watchlists_count = 2;
536 |     int32 ai_portfolios_count = 3;
537 |     double total_portfolio_value = 4;
538 | }
539 | 
540 | // Popular symbols list
541 | message PopularSymbolsList {
542 |     repeated PopularSymbolInfo symbols = 1;
543 |     int32 total_count = 2;
544 | }
545 | 
546 | message PopularSymbolInfo {
547 |     string symbol = 1;
548 |     int32 portfolio_count = 2;
549 |     int32 total_holdings = 3;
550 | }
551 | 
552 | // Enhanced Portfolio service definition
553 | service PortfolioService {
554 |     // Backward compatibility - Get portfolio for a specific broker account
555 |     rpc GetPortfolio(GetPortfolioRequest) returns (GetPortfolioResponse) {}
556 |     
557 |     // Portfolio CRUD operations
558 |     rpc CreatePortfolio(CreatePortfolioRequest) returns (CreatePortfolioResponse) {}
559 |     rpc UpdatePortfolio(UpdatePortfolioRequest) returns (UpdatePortfolioResponse) {}
560 |     rpc DeletePortfolio(DeletePortfolioRequest) returns (google.protobuf.Empty) {}
561 |     rpc GetPortfolioDetails(GetPortfolioDetailsRequest) returns (GetPortfolioDetailsResponse) {}
562 |     rpc ListPortfolios(ListPortfoliosRequest) returns (ListPortfoliosResponse) {}
563 |     
564 |     // Symbol management
565 |     rpc AddSymbol(AddSymbolRequest) returns (AddSymbolResponse) {}
566 |     rpc RemoveSymbol(RemoveSymbolRequest) returns (google.protobuf.Empty) {}
567 |     rpc UpdateSymbolTargets(UpdateSymbolTargetsRequest) returns (UpdateSymbolTargetsResponse) {}
568 |     rpc GetPortfolioSymbols(GetPortfolioSymbolsRequest) returns (GetPortfolioSymbolsResponse) {}
569 |     
570 |     // Sharing functionality
571 |     rpc SharePortfolio(SharePortfolioRequest) returns (SharePortfolioResponse) {}
572 |     rpc UnsharePortfolio(UnsharePortfolioRequest) returns (google.protobuf.Empty) {}
573 |     rpc GetSharedPortfolios(GetSharedPortfoliosRequest) returns (GetSharedPortfoliosResponse) {}
574 |     
575 |     // AI features (future implementation)
576 |     rpc GenerateAIPortfolio(GenerateAIPortfolioRequest) returns (GenerateAIPortfolioResponse) {}
577 |     rpc GetAISuggestions(GetAISuggestionsRequest) returns (GetAISuggestionsResponse) {}
578 |     
579 |     // Statistics and analytics
580 |     rpc GetPortfolioStatistics(GetPortfolioStatisticsRequest) returns (GetPortfolioStatisticsResponse) {}
581 |     rpc GetPopularSymbols(GetPopularSymbolsRequest) returns (GetPopularSymbolsResponse) {}
582 | }
</content>

  1 | """Portfolio gRPC servicer following current architecture patterns."""
  2 | 
  3 | import logging
  4 | from uuid import uuid4
  5 | from datetime import datetime
  6 | 
  7 | from src.application.use_cases.get_portfolio import GetPortfolioUseCase
  8 | from src.application.mappers.portfolio_mapper import PortfolioDomainToApplicationMapper
  9 | from src.presentation.grpc.generated import portfolio_pb2, portfolio_pb2_grpc
 10 | from src.presentation.grpc.mappers.portfolio_mapper import PortfolioMapper
 11 | from src.shared.error_handlers import EnhancedGrpcErrorHandler
 12 | from src.shared.broker_exceptions.base import BrokerException
 13 | from src.application.exceptions import DomainException
 14 | 
 15 | 
 16 | class PortfolioServicer(portfolio_pb2_grpc.PortfolioServiceServicer):
 17 |     """Portfolio gRPC service following current architecture patterns."""
 18 | 
 19 |     def __init__(
 20 |         self,
 21 |         get_portfolio_use_case: GetPortfolioUseCase,
 22 |         domain_mapper: PortfolioDomainToApplicationMapper
 23 |     ):
 24 |         self.get_portfolio_use_case = get_portfolio_use_case
 25 |         self.domain_mapper = domain_mapper
 26 |         self.grpc_mapper = PortfolioMapper()
 27 |         self.error_handler = EnhancedGrpcErrorHandler("PortfolioService", portfolio_pb2.GetPortfolioResponse)
 28 |         self.logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
 29 | 
 30 |     async def GetPortfolio(
 31 |         self, request: portfolio_pb2.GetPortfolioRequest, context
 32 |     ) -> portfolio_pb2.GetPortfolioResponse:
 33 |         """Get portfolio information."""
 34 |         request_id = request.request_id or str(uuid4())
 35 |         
 36 |         try:
 37 |             # Get user_id from authentication context
 38 |             from src.presentation.grpc.security import auth_context
 39 |             user_id = auth_context.get_authenticated_user_id()
 40 |             if not user_id:
 41 |                 return self._create_error_response(
 42 |                     "Authentication required",
 43 |                     request_id,
 44 |                     code=401
 45 |                 )
 46 | 
 47 |             # Validate required fields using proto semantics
 48 |             try:
 49 |                 has_data = request.HasField("data")  # type: ignore[attr-defined]
 50 |             except Exception:
 51 |                 has_data = False
 52 | 
 53 |             if not has_data:
 54 |                 self.logger.debug(f"[{request_id}] Incoming request missing 'data' field: {request!r}")
 55 |                 return self._create_error_response(
 56 |                     "broker_id and account_number are required in data",
 57 |                     request_id,
 58 |                     code=400
 59 |                 )
 60 | 
 61 |             broker_id_value = request.data.broker_id
 62 |             account_number_value = request.data.account_number
 63 | 
 64 |             if not broker_id_value or not account_number_value:
 65 |                 self.logger.debug(
 66 |                     f"[{request_id}] Missing values - broker_id: '{broker_id_value}', account_number: '{account_number_value}', "
 67 |                     f"raw data: {request.data!r}"
 68 |                 )
 69 |                 return self._create_error_response(
 70 |                     "broker_id and account_number are required in data",
 71 |                     request_id,
 72 |                     code=400
 73 |                 )
 74 | 
 75 |             self.logger.info(
 76 |                 f"[{request_id}] Processing GetPortfolio request for broker_id: {broker_id_value}, "
 77 |                 f"account: {account_number_value}, user: {user_id}"
 78 |             )
 79 | 
 80 |             # Convert gRPC request to use case input with user_id from context
 81 |             input_data = self.grpc_mapper.map_grpc_request_to_input(request, user_id)
 82 | 
 83 |             # Execute use case
 84 |             result = await self.get_portfolio_use_case.execute(input_data)
 85 | 
 86 |             # If portfolio data is available, map it to DTO
 87 |             if result.portfolio:
 88 |                 portfolio_dto = self.domain_mapper.map_portfolio_data_to_dto(result.portfolio)
 89 |                 # Add DTO to result for gRPC mapping
 90 |                 result.data = portfolio_dto
 91 |             else:
 92 |                 result.data = None
 93 | 
 94 |             # Map to gRPC response
 95 |             response = self.grpc_mapper.map_output_to_grpc_response(result)
 96 | 
 97 |             self.logger.info(
 98 |                 f"[{request_id}] Successfully processed GetPortfolio request for broker_id: {request.data.broker_id}"
 99 |             )
100 |             return response
101 | 
102 |         except BrokerException as e:
103 |             self.logger.error(f"[{request_id}] Broker error in GetPortfolio: {e}")
104 |             return self._create_error_response(
105 |                 f"Broker error: {e.message}",
106 |                 request_id,
107 |                 code=502
108 |             )
109 |         except DomainException as e:
110 |             self.logger.error(f"[{request_id}] Domain error in GetPortfolio: {e}")
111 |             return self._create_error_response(
112 |                 f"Domain error: {e.message}",
113 |                 request_id,
114 |                 code=400
115 |             )
116 |         except Exception as e:
117 |             self.logger.error(f"[{request_id}] Unexpected error in GetPortfolio: {e}", exc_info=True)
118 |             return self._create_error_response(
119 |                 "An unexpected error occurred",
120 |                 request_id,
121 |                 code=500
122 |             )
123 | 
124 |     def _create_error_response(
125 |         self,
126 |         error_message: str,
127 |         request_id: str,
128 |         code: int = 400
129 |     ) -> portfolio_pb2.GetPortfolioResponse:
130 |         """Create standardized error response."""
131 |         return portfolio_pb2.GetPortfolioResponse(
132 |             response_id=str(uuid4()),
133 |             timestamp=datetime.utcnow().isoformat() + "Z",
134 |             reference_id=request_id,
135 |             code=code,
136 |             message=error_message,
137 |             data=None
138 |         )
</content>
</file>
